00020 class VtkWrap(wx.Panel):#(wxVTKRenderWindow):
00021     """wraps matlab-like vtk window"""
00022     
00023     def __init__(self, parent, id):
00024         """
00025         Define the plotting panel for the graph.
00026         """
00027         wx.Panel.__init__(self, parent=parent, id=id)
00028         self.parent=parent
00029         self.plotItems=parent.plotItems
00030 
00031         self._embedInWx()
00032         plt = VtkBackend(self) # Create backend instance
00033         use(plt, globals()) # Export public namespace of plt to globals()
00034 
00035         # Add the plot widget
00036         self._add_plot_widget()
00037         
00038     def _embedInWx(self):
00039         self.wxRW = wxVTKRenderWindow(self.parent, -1, size=(50,50)) # use the main frame as the parent 
00040         #self.ren = vtk.vtkRenderer()
00041         #wx.GetRenderWindow().AddRenderer(self.ren)

00045         #renwin.SetSize(width+1, height+1)
00046         #renwin.LineSmoothingOn()
00047         #tkw.UpdateRenderer(0.0, 0.0)
00048         #renwin.Render()        
00049         
00050     def addLine(self,x,y):
00051         line, = plot(x,y)
00052         
00053         PlotItemRegistry.lines = PlotItemRegistry.lines + 1
00054         #self.plotItems.append(['line',line])   
00055         self.plotItems['line'+str(PlotItemRegistry.lines)] = line  
00056         # this method should be called anytime a new object is loaded into the plot
00057         self.parent.plotBrowser.updateList()  
00058 
00059     def _add_plot_widget(self):
00060         """Pop up the plotting widget"""
00061         # Put a figure on the panel, add some axes and put it on a canvas
00062         self.figure = Figure()
00063         self.axes   = self.figure.gca()
00064         #self.lines = None
00065         #self.plotItems.append(['figure',self.figure])
00066         #self.plotItems.append(['axes',self.axes])
00067         #self.plotItems['canvas']=self.canvas
00068         self.plotItems['figure']=self.figure
00069         self.plotItems['axes']=self.axes
00070 
00071         # Layout the window
00072         sizer = wx.BoxSizer(wx.VERTICAL)
00073         sizer.Add(self.wxRW, 1, wx.LEFT|wx.TOP|wx.GROW)
00074         self.SetSizer(sizer)  
00075     
00076     def replot(self):
00077         handle=self.plotItems['axes']
00078         handle.draw()
00079         self.Refresh()
